summary: Fixed AuthServiceProvider to conditionally register BeautyBooking policies only when module is published. Previously, policies were hardcoded in the \$policies property array, causing ClassNotFoundException when module was disabled. Changed to register policies conditionally in boot() method using addon_published_status() check before calling registerPolicies().
current_status: AuthServiceProvider bug fixed. Policies are now registered conditionally only when BeautyBooking module is published, preventing ClassNotFoundException when module is disabled. All linting checks passed.
